name: CYAN (arottenpotato, arjunrajan)
description:
Cyan is the schmup with a difference!!!!

Unfortunately, your ship's health is constantly deteriorating and the only way to replenish health in the light dimension is to ram enemies and absorb enemy fire to regain your health. Problem is,ramming them does swap dimensions,somewhat.

In the dark dimension,you can fire,but that burns more health.And enemy fire will hurt you as well here.

Shoot enemies to set high scores or just try to survive by maxing your health.

But be warned,maxing your health can lead to a powerful energy discharge that will hurt you a bit.

Created in 48hrs for the GMTK Game Jam 2018 by a team of two brothers.

Why it's appropriate for the theme: Shoot-em-ups have shoot in their name.In our game you can't shoot unless you're in the dark dimension. And even then, each shot consumes a bit of your own health. 

Ashish Rajan (arottenpotato.itch.io)- General doer of things.

Arjun Rajan (arjunrajan.itch.io) - General doer of other things.

Engine-Construct 2
Other software used - Photoshop,GIMP2,Audacity and FLStudio


P.s The Help button is broken.Which isn't very helpful at all.Whoops.Sorry 

Please,do enjoy :)
